GSD.description:
ext4: block range must be validated before use in ext4_mb_clear_bb()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.4 by commit a2522041d248a8c969cbbc97e1fc2cd8b4de120d. For more details please see the references link.
